channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Hitman
channel.description:
**Hitman** (Offensive) - Neutral
-----------------
_Night Ability 1:_
**Stand Watch** (Unlimited) - Guard a Target.
_Night Ability 2:_
**Execute** (One Time) - Kill a Target. Bypasses night immunity.
_Passive_
**Above My Paygrade** - Cannot be contracted with a ~~royal blood~~ unique class.
-----------------
_Lore:_
He has been ordered to kill by an anonymous royal member.
_Mechanics:_
He is informed at the start of the game:
> "Your contract is a Court Wizard. Eliminate them at all costs."
They are occupy immune.
-----------------
_Win Condition:_
Kill your contracted class

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Hitman
item.dc:creator: livejamie
item.description:
CN73DRUMMER:

Those are good. But I feel like mercanary describes your character the best. Honestly I feel like they should just take the current mercenary and add your idea to it. So the merc has somebody to guard and somebody to kill!

Yeah, I assume that would cause too much confusion.

But if it was possible, I feel like the current mercenary in the game feels more like a guard or bodyguard.

Digging into the thesaurus some better name for the current Merc would potentially be: Guard, Defender, Escort, Warden, Lookout, Guardian, Sentinel, Sentry

If it was to become a class, I’d hope the class name was changed. Nothing against the class or idea or anything. But hitman is a bit of an anachronism. item.description:
Hmm.

  1. Is he ever contracted to Evil or Neutral classes?

  2. What if upon his first target’s death he opens a second envelope appointing him a secondary target? Like it would be “only open this upon failure of your first mission” kind of flavor. This would help those games where your target dies N1 and you lose through no fault of your own.
